languages.text: {n}Тонкие пальцы складываются в странном жесте, словно эльдарка расплетает невидимую нить.{/n} "Наш разговор лишь подтверждает мои слова, элантах: мон-кай и дети Азуриана отличны друг от друга как ночь и день. Эльдары не просто видят мир иначе — мы видим больше, чем любой мон-кай способен осознать".

{n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."
languages.original_text: {n}Тонкие пальцы складываются в странном жесте, словно эльдарка расплетает невидимую нить.{/n} "Наш разговор лишь подтверждает мои слова, элантах: мон-кай и дети Азуриана отличны друг от друга как ночь и день. Эльдары не просто видят мир иначе — мы видим больше, чем любой мон-кай способен осознать".

traits.locale_text: {n}The slender fingers make a gesture as if the Aeldari is looming an invisible thread.{/n} "Our talk has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. The Aeldari don't just see the world differently — they see more than any of the mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

{n}The slender fingers make a gesture as if the Aeldari is looming an invisible thread.{/n} "Our talk has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. The Aeldari don't just see the world differently — they see more than any of the mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

{n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is Aeldari is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

{n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is Aeldari is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

{n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特用纤长的手指做了个复杂的手势，仿佛要解开某个看不见的绳结一样。{/n}“我们的对话再次证明了我的观点，外界人，那就是阿苏焉之子与猴子有云泥之别。艾达灵族并非在看待世界的方法上与猴子有多么不同，而是我们能看到猴子根本无法理解的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特用纤长的手指做了个复杂的手势，仿佛要解开某个看不见的绳结一样。{/n}“我们的对话再次证明了我的观点，外界人，那就是阿苏焉之子与猴子有云泥之别。艾达灵族并非在看待世界的方法上与猴子有多么不同，而是我们能看到猴子根本无法理解的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Hace un gesto con sus delicados dedos, como si desenredase un hilo invisible.{/n} «Esta conversación no ha hecho más que confirmar mi argumento, elantach: los mon-keigh y los hijos de Asuryan son tan diferentes como la noche del día. No es que los Aeldari veamos el mundo de un modo distinto; es que vemos más de lo que ningún mon-keigh puede llegar a comprender».
languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Aeldari hace un gesto con sus delicados dedos, como si desenredase un hilo invisible.{/n} «Esta conversación no ha hecho más que confirmar mi argumento, elantach: los mon-keigh y los hijos de Asuryan son tan diferentes como la noche del día. No es que los Aeldari veamos el mundo de un modo distinto; es que vemos más de lo que ningún mon-keigh puede llegar a comprender».

languages.text: {n}Elle agite ses doigts fins, comme si elle tentait de démêler un fil invisible.{/n} « Notre conversation ne fait que confirmer mes dires, elantach : les enfants d'Asuryan et les mon-keigh sont comme le jour et la nuit. Les Aeldaris ne se contentent pas de voir le monde d'une manière différente, ils perçoivent bien plus de choses que les mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle agite ses doigts fins, comme si elle tentait de démêler un fil invisible.{/n} « Notre conversation ne fait que confirmer mes dires, elantach : les enfants d'Asuryan et les mon-keigh sont comme le jour et la nuit. Les Aeldaris ne se contentent pas de voir le monde d'une manière différente, ils perçoivent bien plus de choses que les mon-keigh. »

languages.text: {n}Ihre schlanken Finger machen eine Geste, als würde sie einen unsichtbaren Faden entwirren.{/n} "Unser Gespräch beweist nur meinen Standpunkt, Elantach: Chem-Pan-Sey und Kinder von Asuryan sind verschieden wie Tag und Nacht. Aeldari sehen die Welt nicht nur anders – sie sehen mehr, als jeder Chem-Pan-Sey je begreifen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre schlanken Finger machen eine Geste, als würde sie einen unsichtbaren Faden entwirren.{/n} "Unser Gespräch beweist nur meinen Standpunkt, Elantach: Chem-Pan-Sey und Kinder von Asuryan sind verschieden wie Tag und Nacht. Aeldari sehen die Welt nicht nur anders – sie sehen mehr, als jeder Chem-Pan-Sey je begreifen kann."

languages.text: {n}彼女の細い指は、まるで見えない糸をほどくような仕草をする。{/n}「我らの会話は、我の言いたいことを証明しただけだ、エランタ。モン＝ケイとアシュリアンの御子らは昼と夜ほど違う。アエルダリは単に世界が違って見えるというだけではない。御子らは、どんなモン＝ケイにも理解できないほどさまざまなものを見ている」
languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の細い指は、まるで見えない糸をほどくような仕草をする。{/n}「我らの会話は、我の言いたいことを証明しただけだ、エランタ。モン＝ケイとアシュリアンの御子らは昼と夜ほど違う。アエルダリは単に世界が違って見えるというだけではない。御子らは、どんなモン＝ケイにも理解できないほどさまざまなものを見ている」

languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is Aeldari is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

languages.text: {n}İnce parmakları, görünmez bir düğümü çözmeye çalışırmış gibi bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Konuşmamız, benim haklı olduğumu kanıtlıyor elantach. Mon-keighler ve Asuryan'ın Çocukları, birbirlerinden gece ile gündüz kadar farklı. Aeldariler sadece dünyaya daha farklı bakmıyor, herhangi bir mon-keigh'nin anlayamayacağı kadar çok şeyi görüyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Her slender fingers make a gesture as if she is untwisting an invisible thread.{/n} "Our conversation has only proved my point, elantach, that mon-keigh and the Children of Asuryan are as different as night and day. Aeldari do not simply see the world differently — they see more than any mon-keigh can ever comprehend."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnce parmakları, görünmez bir düğümü çözmeye çalışırmış gibi bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Konuşmamız benim haklı olduğumu kanıtlıyor elantach, mon-keigh ve Asuryan'ın Çocukları birbirinden gece ve gündüz kadar farklı. Aeldariler sadece dünyaya daha farklı bakmıyor, herhangi bir mon-keigh'nin anlayamayacağı kadar fazla şeyi görüyorlar."
